channel.title: Latest News and News Headlines | Daily Telegraph

item.title: Mother confronts daughter’s murderer
item.description: A grieving mother has confronted the Muay Thai expert who brutally bashed her daughter to death during a drug-addled rage, telling a court of the heartbreak that had rippled through her family’s life.

item.title: Violence erupts at construction protest
item.description: A chaotic brawl has erupted outside CFMEU headquarters after hundreds of people showed up to protest mandatory vaccinations for construction workers.

item.title: Barnaby‘s harsh message to unvaxxed
item.description: Unvaccinated Australians have been told if they choose not to receive a jab they will not be the government’s problem as the nation reopens.

item.title: Germany’s DAX index grows from 30 to 40 firms in revamp
item.description: Ten companies will join the DAX on Monday as the blue-chip stock market index undergoes its biggest facelift in its 33-year history in response to turmoil in the German corporate world.

item.title: ‘Hotel Rwanda’ hero to learn verdict in terror trial
item.description: A court is set to deliver its verdict Monday against Paul Rusesabagina, the "Hotel Rwanda" hero turned government critic who is charged with terrorism in a trial supporters say is politically motivated.

item.title: Mercedes allegedly used in murder plot
item.description: Police allege the DNA of a man with suspected links to the Alameddine network was found inside two vehicles connected to an aborted hit on a rival last month, a court has heard.

item.title: ‘No way he’d miss it’: Injured Demon doesn’t train
item.description: Melbourne is confident small forward Charlie Spargo will play in Saturday’s AFL Grand Final after he failed to train with his teammates on Monday.

item.title: ‘Extraordinary times’: Anti-vax first as player cut
item.description: The NBL could well face a Covid-19 vaccination mandate dilemma after the New Zealand Breakers agreed to release star guard Tai Webster because of his stance to remain unvaccinated.

item.title: Emmy winners in key categories
item.description: Here is a list of the winners in key categories for the 73rd Emmy Awards, which were handed out in Los Angeles on Sunday.

item.title: Yellen urges Congress to raise debt limit to avoid financial crisis
item.description: US Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen pleaded Sunday for Congress to raise the debt ceiling in order to avoid a "historic financial crisis."
